à¹„à¸›à¸›à¸£à¸±à¸šà¹€à¸‹à¸­à¸£à¹Œà¹ƒà¸«à¹‰à¸›à¸±à¹ˆà¸™ à¸Šà¹‰à¸²à¸¥à¸‡à¸™à¸° à¹€à¸à¸¡à¹à¸¡à¹ˆà¸‡à¹„à¸¡à¹ˆà¸¡à¸µ balance à¹€à¸¥à¸¢ à¹à¸‚à¸§à¸™à¹„à¸”à¹‰à¸„à¸™à¹€à¸”à¸µà¸¢à¸§à¹„à¸¡à¹ˆà¸–à¸¶à¸‡ 1 à¸™à¸²à¸—à¸µ à¹€à¸ªà¸£à¹‡à¸ˆà¹„à¸› 2à¹€à¸„à¸£à¸·à¹ˆà¸­à¸‡ à¹ƒà¸„à¸£à¸ˆà¸°à¹„à¸›à¹€à¸¥à¹ˆà¸™à¸–à¸²à¸¡à¸ˆà¸£à¸´à¸‡

I got Dead By Daylight in early 2019 to play with some friends in some custom games, but I never really played it all too much except from said occasional private matches we would set up together. I mostly forgot about the game, whilst other people told me about the good times they were having but that queue times were always extremely long. 

I started watching some content on YouTube and also saw the game was hitting all time peak player counts and that crossplay had been implemented so I thought now was as best a time as ever to get into it. 

Pros-
+A diverse lineup of original characters and liscened survivors and killers, it's never [i]not[/i] cool to be chased by ghostface, pyramid head, mike myers or nemesis 
+Satisfying gameplay loop with enough differences game to game provided by the different killers, perks and maps you play on
+Good performance, mostly sticking to 120fps at 1440p ultra settings on my computer, some of the newer maps have lower fps but with variable refresh rate it feels fine
+Team based survival gameplay that's extremely gratifying when things go to plan or you save a friend 

Cons-
-Extremely toxic community, mostly those who play survivor imo, very entitled and angry individuals who play this game 
-Very questionable matchmaking at times, but it's not too common to get paired with people way better or way worse than you
-No way to communicate with others on other platforms, which is a shame if you wanna thank them or tell em gg or just talk about the game in general

[b]Rating: 4/5[/b]

Like Among Us but don't have the friends for a lobby? Like murdering but don't want the jail time? like the villians from video games more than the good guys? Like being a good guy and thwarting villians. Love horror movies but get tossed out of theaters for screaming at the protaganists for being stupid and think you can do better? This is the game for you.

The new update is probably the dumbest thing i have ever heard. I play both survivor and killer, survivor was fine as it was, even though most of the aspects were pretty killer sided. But now the devs have decided to completely ruin the game by ruining dead hard (the only survivor perk that was balanced), making killers even faster by increasing their speed by 10%, and ruining a whole bunch of perks. With an already declining player base, this is gonna make things much worse. Good one behaviour yeah woo! Im gonna stop playing after this update

Allora quando fate un Killer un'po la mettete la mano sulla coscienza perchÃ¨ ormai non si puÃ² scappare in 4 supersiti, C'Ã¨ lo spettro (molto facile da trovare nelle partite grado 12 - 18) che Ã¨ veramente Op, io quando ci giocavo tanto tempo fa il gioco era molto bilanciato senza ganci ogni 4 metri ecc, ora vi chiedo: Voi avete scelto di fare felice killer mettendo i ganci ogni piÃ¹ o meno 15 metri quindi se tu ne saboti uno non ha senso perchÃ¨ muori lo stesso e se il killer ti prende mentre tu cerchi di estrarre un supersite dal gancio e fallisci il tentativo di fuga al tuo amico il killer ti mette al gancio e poi in totale della partita siete in 2 al gancio e volendo se il killer guarda i ganci da una angolazione riesce a camperare in tutte e due i ganci e anche se gli ultimi 2 supersiti vengono a prenderti tu dopo 2 passi ti prende comunque anche se hai: Morto Stecchito, Atterraggio Bilanciato oppure una torcia o altre competenze sempre che contrastano il Killer muori comunque io una cosa che farei Ã¨ allontanare i ganci, ma non di 5 metri in piÃ¹ ma in modo che il seminterrato Ã¨ lontano da i ganci fuori, e i ganci in generale devono fare in modo che il Killer non sorveglia tutte e due i ganci allo stesso tempo.

Detto questo idea veramente fantastica gioco che potrebbe arrivare molto oltre, l'unico problema Ã¨: Se il Killer gioca senza Competenze muori lo stesso e se il Supersite gioca senza Competenze non cambia niente muori lo stesso.

Se fossi stato un programmatore di questo gioco (PerchÃ¨ Ã¨ giusto fare una critica costruttiva perchÃ¨ se solamente insulterei non cambierebbe niente) Se ascolterei alcuni commenti negativi io inizierei a risolvere il problema aggiustando i ganci e a depotenziare qualche Killer.
(Esempio il Nemesis che lo rende Pay-To-Win)
